WenAnXiJu: Holds in the 4th quarter. Students from each house show their self-directed drama on the Black Box
WenAnLanQiu: Holds in the 3rd quarter. Students from each house demonstrate their effort on the basketball gym.
WenAnWuDao: Holds in the 2nd quarter. Students from each house show their self-directed dance on the Black Box
WenAnZuQiu: Holds in the 1st quarter. Students from each house demonstrate their effort on the soccer ground.
